page.title: 08The Gwent Constabulary.
page.content: The Gwent Constabulary is divided into three divisions; Blackwood, Pontypool, Newport. Inspector Heal of Blackwood has one sergeant and seven Constables in each of four shifts. Community Constables look after a small area: Blackwood, Oakdale, Pontllanfraith, Pengam/Fleur De Lys, Cefn Fforest, Ynysddu and Cwmfelinfach, Markham. Station has scene of crime Dept. Finger prints, photographs, evidence examined and recorded. Intoxiometer used to test if motorists have drunk too much alcohol. Six cells for detention until hearing out at Williams St. court. Traffic wardens deal with minor parking offences. Police women have the same pay+ duties as men. The station has one police dog for general duties.
